resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158639</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158639</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2761</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Language Testing Practice: Level 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprachenprüfenpraxis: Stufe 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pratique en matière de Test de Langage : 
Niveau 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prática Testando Da Língua: Nível 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pratica Difficile Di Linguaggio: Livello 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γλωσσική εξεταστική πρακτική: Επίπεδο 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Práctica De prueba Del Lenguaje: Nivel 1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This item is a test of English language skills for 1st grade students.It requires the student to fill in missing words and tests such skills as punctuation, parts of speech and sentence structure. The correct answers are supplied at the end of the test.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">puctuation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parts of speech</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Einzelteil ist ein Test der englische 
Sprachenfähigkeiten für 1. Grad students.It benötigt den 
Kursteilnehmer, innen fehlende Wörter zu füllen und prüft solche 
Fähigkeiten wie Interpunktion, Wortklassen und Programmsatzstruktur. 
Die korrekten Antworten werden am Ende des Tests angegeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet élément est un essai des qualifications 
d'anglais pour la 1ère catégorie students.It exige de l'étudiant de
remplir mots manquants dedans et teste des qualifications telles que 
la ponctuation, les parties du discours et la structure de la phrase. 
Les réponses correctes sont fournies à l'extrémité de 
l'essai.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo é um teste de habilidades de língua
inglesa para a 1a classe students.It requer o estudante encher 
palavras dentro faltando e testa habilidades como a pontuação, as 
partes do discurso e a estrutura de sentença. As respostas 
corretas são fornecidas na extremidade do teste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo è una prova delle abilità di 
lingua inglese per il primo grado students.It richiede all'allievo di 
riempire le parole dentro di mancanza e verifica tali abilità come la
punteggiatura, le parti del discorso e la struttura di frase. Le
risposte corrette sono fornite all'estremità della prova.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το αντικείμενο είναι μια δοκιμή των δεξιοτήτων 
αγγλικής γλώσσας για τους 1$ους σπουδαστές βαθμού Απαιτεί 
το σπουδαστή για να συμπληρώσει τις ελλείπουσες λέξεις και 
εξετάζει τέτοιες δεξιότητες όπως τη στίξη, τα μέρη του λόγου 
και τη δομή πρότασης. Οι σωστές απαντήσεις παρέχονται στο 
τέλος της δοκιμής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este item es una prueba de las habilidades de 
lenguaje inglés para el 1r grado students.It requiere a estudiante 
llenar palabras adentro que faltan y prueba las habilidades tales como
la puntuación, partes del discurso y la estructura de sentencia. 
Las respuestas correctas se proveen en el extremo de la prueba.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">puctuation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortklassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">puctuation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">parties du discours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épellation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">puctuation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">partes do discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">soletração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">puctuation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">parti del discorso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ortografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">puctuation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μέρη του λόγου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορθογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lenguaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
